label: 唐花文
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 57th  . Nara National Museum . 2005
説明文: A paternized top-view of a flower forming a medallion: generally the floral motif is a composite of concentric rings of top-view and side-view flowers. A full karahana design includes rows of such round floral motifs combined with rows of diamond-shaped floral motifs.
